member.name: M:Volo.Abp.DistributedLocking.IAbpDistributedLock.TryAcquireAsync(System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Tries to acquire a named lock. Returns a disposable object to release the lock. It is suggested to use this method within a using block. Returns null if the lock could not be handled.
member.param: How long to wait before giving up on the acquisition attempt. Defaults to 0
